analysis.description:
FuddCrowdsale.balances (/unique_chucks/14/0xf0fd80b2cce26d5b0441250a0414e8174f315b73.sol#42-44) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/14/0xf0fd80b2cce26d5b0441250a0414e8174f315b73.sol#106-110)

Reentrancy in FuddCrowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0xf0fd80b2cce26d5b0441250a0414e8174f315b73.sol#177-209):
	External calls:
	- fuddToken.transfer(investor,tokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0xf0fd80b2cce26d5b0441250a0414e8174f315b73.sol#201-203)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- purchasingAllowed (/unique_chucks/14/0xf0fd80b2cce26d5b0441250a0414e8174f315b73.sol#209)
	- stage (/unique_chucks/14/0xf0fd80b2cce26d5b0441250a0414e8174f315b73.sol#209)

FuddCrowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0xf0fd80b2cce26d5b0441250a0414e8174f315b73.sol#177-209) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-fuddToken.transfer(investor,tokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0xf0fd80b2cce26d5b0441250a0414e8174f315b73.sol#201-203)
